definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Check he expiry date for all foam extinguisher.
sentences.chinese: 检查所有泡沫灭火器的过期时间。

sentences.english: The second is to master fire, fire extinguishing basic common sense.
sentences.chinese: 二是掌握防火，灭火基本常识。

sentences.english: The results of field test show that a well effect of extinguish fire can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 野外灭火试验表明，该枪灭火效果较好。

sentences.english: The results of field test show that a well effect of extinguish fire can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 野外灭火试验表明，该枪灭火效果较好。

sentences.english: Elite is currently the most advanced world-class purpose built fireboat .
sentences.chinese: 此船是现时最先进的世界级专业灭火轮之一。

sentences.english: They threw eggs, sticks, bottles and a fire extinguisher at the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们向警察投掷了鸡蛋，木棍，酒瓶和一些灭火器。

sentences.english: Portable extinguishers in saloon not in position.
sentences.chinese: 大台的手提式灭火器放的位置不对。

sentences.english: Buy a fire extinguisher to keep outside.
sentences.chinese: 买一个灭火器放到室外。

sentences.english: When complete, this inflatable will be a nice addition to my fireboat .
sentences.chinese: 完成时，这个充气式将是一个很好，除了我的灭火轮。

sentences.english: Portable extinguishers in position and operational.
sentences.chinese: 手提式灭火器在其位并好用。

sentences.english: Formulate pre-proposal on fire fighting and emergency evacuation and organize regular fire drill.
sentences.chinese: 制定灭火和应急疏散预案，定期组织消防演练。

sentences.english: State when and how fire blankets should be maintained.
sentences.chinese: 请說明何时及如何保养灭火毡。

sentences.english: Are there sufficient fire extinguishers and other fire fighting equipment?
sentences.chinese: 有没有足够的灭火筒或其他防火设备？

sentences.english: He stamped on the sparks to deep the brush- fire from spreading.
sentences.chinese: 他踏灭火花，以免灌木林火蔓延开来。

sentences.english: Portable extinguishers in hold No. 2 not accessible.
sentences.chinese: 放在2舱的手提式灭火器够不着。

sentences.english: It will start with theory of fire and extinguishment and explain sources of risk and fire protection installations.
sentences.chinese: 课程从灭火理论开始，介绍风险源及防火装置。

definition: to catch fire/to cook/to get angry
